description.value: Regeneration doesn't function while Kas is exposed to direct sunlight.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

+31 vs AC; 2d10+10 damage.

Encounter ✦ Healing

Standard

+29 vs Fortitude; 2d12+14 damage, and the target is weakened (save ends), and Kas regains 59 hit points.

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

Targets up to three creatures

+31 vs AC; 2d10+10 damage, and Kas slides the target 3 squares.

Recharge 4-6 ✦ Charm, Gaze

Minor, Recharge

Ranged 5

+29 vs Will; the target is dominated (save ends). Aftereffect: The target is dazed (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Minor 1/Round, At-Will

Close burst 5

Targets one enemy; no attack roll; the target is marked until the end of Kas's next turn. If the target makes an attack that doesn't include Kas as a target while marked by this power, it takes ongoing 10 necrotic damage (save ends)

Trigger: When kas becomes bloodied

All adverse effects affecting Kas end, then Kas takes a standard action after the triggering action is resolved

Encounter ✦ Polymorph

Standard

Kas becomes insubstantial and gains fly (hover) 12 until the end of his next turn. Kas cannot attack while in this form and can sustain this form for up to 1 hour.

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When hit by an attack

Kas flies 6 squares and is insubstantial while he flies. He can make a bastard sword attack before or after he flies.

system.biography:
HP 952; Bloodied 476
Regeneration 20 (regeneration doesn’t function while Kas is exposed to direct sunlight)
Resist 15 fire, 15 necrotic Vulnerable 10 radiant Immune disease, poison 		Init +20 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 40Fort 41Ref 39Will 41
Speed 7, climb 3 (spider climb)
Ability ScoresStr 26 (+21)
Con 22 (+19)		Dex 20 (+18)
Int 24 (+20)		Wis 19 (+17)
Cha 28 (+22)
Languages Common
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +25, Insight +22, Intimidate +27, Religion +25, Stealth +22Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 27 | Insight 32

Equipment bastard sword , plate armor .
